title: profile-page

context_script:
context.sat_plan = frappe.db.get_all('Gym Workout Plan Exercise', filters={'parent': args.get('name'),'parentfield':'saturday'}, fields=['workout_name'])
context.sun_plan = frappe.db.get_all('Gym Workout Plan Exercise', filters={'parent': args.get('name'),'parentfield':'sunday'}, fields=['workout_name'])
context.mon_plan = frappe.db.get_all('Gym Workout Plan Exercise', filters={'parent': args.get('name'),'parentfield':'monday'}, fields=['workout_name'])
context.tue_plan = frappe.db.get_all('Gym Workout Plan Exercise', filters={'parent': args.get('name'),'parentfield':'tuesday'}, fields=['workout_name'])
context.wed_plan = frappe.db.get_all('Gym Workout Plan Exercise', filters={'parent': args.get('name'),'parentfield':'wednesday'}, fields=['workout_name'])
context.thur_plan = frappe.db.get_all('Gym Workout Plan Exercise', filters={'parent': args.get('name'),'parentfield':'thursday'}, fields=['workout_name'])
context.fri_plan = frappe.db.get_all('Gym Workout Plan Exercise', filters={'parent': args.get('name'),'parentfield':'friday'}, fields=['workout_name'])
